document_name: Law No. 29-Z on protection of atmospheric air
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BLR/1997/BLR-1997-04-15-Law No. 29-Z on protection of atmospheric air_aa8b0eda24321e55f6e1b430512daef1.pdf
document_description: This law outlines the general procedures for regulating air pollution in Belarus, including carbon dioxide emissions. Among its many functions, it requires the government to create a unified clean air policy, adopt laws and regulations for clean air, develop and implement scientific programs for clean air, establish restrictions and standards for air pollution, and determine accounting procedures for emissions and air pollution.
